question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the roof of a building three floors ahead. At the current location, if the roof three stories ahead is not within your field of view, what is the most relevant object in your field of view, and where is this object?  
choose:  
A. I cannot see the roofs of the three floors in front, but there is a parking lot on the right side of my view.  
B. I cannot see the roof of the three-story building in front, but the main entrance of the three-story building is in the center of my field of view.  
C. I cannot see the roofs of the three floors in front, but there is a small park in the top center of my view.  
D. The roofs of the three floors ahead are already in sight.  
E. I cannot see the roofs of the three-story building ahead, but the tops of the two tall buildings are in the upper left and upper right of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The main entrance of the three-story building is prominently visible in the center of the field of view, while the roof of the building three floors ahead is not within sight. This matches the description in option B.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 55)]
Option: B
Reason: From the initial position, the roofs of the three floors ahead are not visible. However, the main entrance of the three-story building is prominently in the center of the view. This aligns with option B. The provided answer is correct.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The main entrance of the three-story building is prominently visible in the center of the field of view, while the roof of the building three floors ahead is not within sight. This matches the description in option B.
